tns:patch.keyword: Add trubudget settings to global setting
tns:patch.author: brianbrix

script.lang: INSERT INTO amp_global_settings(id,settingsname,settingsvalue,possiblevalues,description,section,value_translatable,internal) VALUES (select(nextval('amp_global_settings_seq')),'isEnabled','true','t_Boolean','Is Trubudget enabled for this deployment','trubudget',NULL,true), (select(nextval('amp_global_settings_seq')),'baseUrl','http://localhost:8080/api/','','Trubudget base url','trubudget',NULL,true), (select(nextval('amp_global_settings_seq')),'rootUser','root','','Trubudget username for root user','trubudget',NULL,true), (select(nextval('amp_global_settings_seq')),'rootPassword','root-secret','','Trubudget password for root user','trubudget',NULL,true), (select(nextval('amp_global_settings_seq')),'organization','KfW','','Organization name to be used for this deployment','trubudget',NULL,true) ON CONFLICT (settingsname,section) DO NOTHING;
